Sioux_Falls.KAUR:
Kaur ({{lang-pa|ਕੌਰ) (Urdu: کَور ‬‎), in Sikhism is commonly a middle name but also used as a last name by many Sikhs.


== History ==
Kaur is a name used by Sikh women as either a middle or last name. The tenth guru of Sikhs, Guru Gobind Singh introduced Kaur and Singh, when he administered Amrit (baptism) to both male and female Sikhs.
